title: On stream
creator_credit: Shell Company of Australia and John Heyer
brief_description: Records the building of the Shell Oil Refinery at Geelong, Victoria. Shows initial stages in the cleaning, dredging and excavating of the land; the arrival of a Dutch contracting firm for the building of the one million pound distillation plant; laying of the pipeline which will carry petroleum to Melbourne. Narrated by Mungo MacCallum.
